main event: An unidentified flying object was observed near Salisbury, Maryland on 23 August 1952.
interesting points: The object was described as having a brilliant green color and was round and high speed,The object was under observation for approximately 1.33 minutes,One witness, a lawyer, reported seeing the object moving at a high rate of speed,Several reports indicated it was silvery in color and circular in shape,The object was estimated to be approximately 30 to 50 feet in diameter.
sighted object: a bright light, about the size of a pin head
witness description: The witness was a lawyer residing in Salisbury, Maryland.
